checkUpkeep(bytes).details: Chainlink Automation function that verifies if upkeep is neededWhen Upkeep is needed, it will call performUpkeep

params.endTime: Time until staking pool becomes unlocked and funds withdrawn
params.interval: How often should rewards be issued

performUpkeep(bytes).details: Once upkeep is needed, performUpkeep will call rewards functionIf enough time (endTime) has passed, it will call withdraw function

userdoc.notice: This contract is for creating an untamperable and transparent staking smart contract
